topics.body:
Being fair though, DBZ has given us pretty unintentional moments. Like this one!

!http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/dragonball/images/9/9a/KidBuuStranglesVegeta.png/revision/latest?cb=20110907162229!

Perfectly portraying a human being (Vegeta) being brutally raped by their problems and responsibilities in their adult life (Kid Buu)
.

Seriously though, i love this pic. It always draws a smile on my face.
